attributes.action: abandon plans to field a combined Great British football team at the London Olympics in 2012.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the Government attempting to force through their plan to field a combined football team consisting of players from England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, we would like plans to be scrapped due to to concerns over the future independence of these home nations in international competitions such as the World Cup and European Championships.
No to team GB for football. Leave our beautiful game alone.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "abandon plans to field a combined Great British football team at the London Olympics in 2012."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19601


Prime Minister's Office
